DOC.brief_summary: The use of propofol or dexmedetomedine for prevention of sevofurane emergence agitation in LDLT recipients
DOC.brief_title: Propofol Versus Dexmedetomidine for Prevention of Sevoflurane Agitation in Recipients of Living Donor Liver Transplantation
DOC.criteria: All recipients of living donor liver transplantation patient refusal Allergy to either propofol or dexmedetomediene CNS disease
